name: AzureSql
help: Manage Azure SQL Databases and Data Warehouses.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Usage
properties.help: Name of usage metric to return.

properties.name: DestName
properties.help: Name of the database that will be created as the copy destination.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL Database.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Server
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL server.

properties.name: DestResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of the resouce group to create the copy in. If unspecified, defaults to the origin resource group.

properties.name: DestServer
properties.help: Name of the server to create the copy in. If unspecified, defaults to the origin server.

properties.name: ElasticPool
properties.help: Name of the elastic pool to create the new database in.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: ServiceObjective
properties.help: Name of the service objective for the new database.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Resource tags.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL Database.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Server
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL server.

properties.name: Collation
properties.help: The collation of the database. If createMode is not Default, this value is ignored.

properties.name: Edition
properties.help: The edition of the database.

properties.name: ElasticPool
properties.help: The name of the elastic pool the database is in. If elasticPoolName and requestedServiceObjectiveName are both updated, the value of requestedServiceObjectiveName is ignored. Not supported for DataWarehouse edition.

properties.name: MaxSize
properties.help: The max storage size of the database. Only the following sizes are supported (in addition to limitations being placed on each edition): 100MB, 500MB, 1GB, 5GB, 10GB, 20GB, 30GB, 150GB, 200GB, 500GB. If no unit is specified, defaults to bytes (B).

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: SampleName
properties.help: Indicates the name of the sample schema to apply when creating this database. If createMode is not Default, this value is ignored. Not supported for DataWarehouse edition.

properties.name: ServiceObjective
properties.help: The name of the configured service level objective of the database. This is the service level objective that is in the process of being applied to the database. Once successfully updated, it will match the value of serviceLevelObjective property. To see possible values, query the capabilities API (/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Sql/locations/{locationID}/capabilities) referred to by operationId: "Capabilities_ListByLocation." or use the Azure CLI command `az sql db list-editions --location &lt;location&gt; --query [].supportedServiceLevelObjectives[].name`.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Resource tags.

properties.name: ZoneRedundant
properties.help: Specifies whether to enable zone redundancy for the database.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL Database.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Server
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL server.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: AdminPassword
properties.help: The password of the SQL administrator.

properties.name: AdminUser
properties.help: The name of the SQL administrator.

properties.name: ResourceGroup

properties.name: Server
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL server.

properties.name: StorageKey
properties.help: The storage key to use.  If storage key type is SharedAccessKey, it must be preceded with a "?.".

properties.name: StorageKeyType
properties.help: The type of the storage key to use.

properties.name: StorageUri
properties.help: The storage uri to use.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Resource tags.

properties.name: DeletedTime
properties.help: If specified, restore from a deleted database instead of from an existing database. Must match the deleted time of a deleted database in the same server. Either --time or --deleted-time (or both) must be specified.

properties.name: Time
properties.help: The point in time of the source database that will be restored to create the new database. Must be greater than or equal to the source database's earliestRestoreDate value. Either --time or --deleted-time (or both) must be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Azure SQL Database.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: ServiceObjective
properties.help: The name of the new service objective. If this is a standalone db service objective and the db is currently in an elastic pool, then the db is removed from the pool.

properties.name: ZoneRedundant
properties.help: Specifies whether to enable zone redundancy for the database.
